text: Aaron G. MacKenzie (born March 7, 1981, in Terrace Bay, Ontario) is a Canadian former professional ice hockey defenceman. He played briefly in the National Hockey League (NHL) with the Colorado Avalanche. MacKenzie made his NHL debut with the Avalanche in a 4-1 win against the Vancouver Canucks.
